pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Mushroom Spores, 1 Acid Fume, 1 Green Dye, 1 Aquatic Foliage, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 125 Sun value.

pages.title: 🧪 Aquatics
pages.text: $(#25228d)Acid-Shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through zombies and destroy metal.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Does acid damage that devastate metal objects.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Acid-shroom's job is to suck the toxins from the water and recycle it by shooting it at zombies. They are serious about environmental activism.
